name: theme_dark
stylesheet: QToolTip { color: #DCDCDC; background-color: #3C3C3C; border: 1px solid #5C5C5C; } QMenuBar { background-color: #2D2D30; color: #DCDCDC; } QMenuBar::item { background-color: transparent; padding: 4px 8px; } QMenuBar::item:selected { background-color: #3C3C3C; } QMenuBar::item:pressed { background-color: #0078D7; } QMenu { background-color: #3C3C3C; color: #DCDCDC; border: 1px solid #5C5C5C; } QMenu::item { padding: 4px 24px 4px 8px; } QMenu::item:selected { background-color: #0078D7; } QMenu::separator { height: 1px; background-color: #5C5C5C; margin: 4px 0px; } QComboBox QAbstractItemView { background-color: #3C3C3C; color: #DCDCDC; selection-background-color: #0078D7; border: 1px solid #5C5C5C; }
